songs.title: Atlas
songs.album: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Some saw the sun
Some saw the smoke
Some heard the gun
Some bent the bow
Sometimes the wire must tense for the note
Caught in the fire, say "oh"
We're about to explode

[Chorus]
Carry your world
I'll carry your world
Carry your world
I'll carry your world

[Verse 2]
Some far away
Some search for gold
Some dragon to slay
Heaven we hope is just up the road
Show me the way, Lord
'Cause I, I'm about to explode

[Chorus]
Carry your world
I'll carry your world
Carry your world
I'll carry your world

[Outro]
Carry your world, and all your hurt
(Carry your world)
